name: This is not farming simulator
description:
WELCOME TO SUNNY VALLEY!

In a role of a gardener, take your watering can, seeds and salt. 

Plant a seed, water it, watch how it grows from ground and keep slugs away from it! Just another sunny day.

Just don´t forget to keep all those beautiful flowers watered.

WSAD - control
E - USE/PICK
MOUSE - Aim and "shot"

1, 2, 3 - Change between seeds, salt and water
